description: I love Heresy. A grand operatic galactic civil war, with themes of betrayal, the sins of fathers, ideology gone wrong. It’s hot stuff. The miniatures rock. For a game that’s basically what if 40K was just space marines it’s got surprising amounts of flavour and variety. Heresy Is Jank But Heresy has some problems. As […]
